name: Cancer Immunology Game
description:
Take control of a cancer-fighting T killer cell inside the body and learn: what mechanisms tumour cell use to cause harm and remain undetected from your immune system; how your body defends itself from such malignancies; what benefit can immunotherapies provide in this eternal battle.

The demo is uploaded in a lower quality on the browser build to accommodate a better gameplay experience. Please leave any feedback on what you would like to see in the final game and page itself. Leave a comment or sign the survey provided in the game or by going directly to the survey! 

We would like to thank the Wellcome-Trust for the ISSF3 Grant that enabled us to develop this game, along with thanks to Cardiff University, the GW4 Biomed DTP and Cancer Research Wales.

Better builds available for download below.

  • PC -> no specific requirements
  • MacOS -> need to call -chmod from terminal to give rights
  • Linux -> wildcard (no where to test it)
